name: The Unknowns Saga vol 2: Monsters Rising
name_original: The Unknowns Saga vol 2: Monsters Rising
description:
Ancient Monsters have started to reclaim their freedom from a life long prison. The only obstacle standing in there way is the Unknowns. Its up to the Unknowns to stop the Ancient monsters and free people from their control. A new system to fight monsters has been added to the Unknowns series. Better english with the help of ThankTheBear. android version coming soon.
